com.alicecallsbob.fcsdk.android.uc

Interface UCListener


  • public interface UCListener
    A listener for the UC that will be informed of events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnectionLost()
      Invoked when there are problems with the network connection and the connection to the server has been lost.
      void onConnectionReestablished()
      Invoked when a failed connection has been reestablished.
      void onConnectionRetry(int attemptNumber, long delayUntilNextAttempt)
      Invoked when a connection has been lost and a retry attempt failed.
      void onGenericError(java.lang.String error, java.lang.String reason)
      Invoked when a generic error has occurred when processing a request.
      void onSessionNotStarted()
      Invoked when the session failed to connect successfully.
      void onSessionStarted()
      Invoked when the session connected successfully.
      void onSystemFailure()
      Invoked when the server has experienced a system failure.

    • Method Detail

      • onSessionStarted

        void onSessionStarted()
        Invoked when the session connected successfully.

      • onSessionNotStarted

        void onSessionNotStarted()
        Invoked when the session failed to connect successfully.

      • onSystemFailure

        void onSystemFailure()
        Invoked when the server has experienced a system failure. The application attempt to log in again and re-establish a new session, or direct the user to do so.

      • onConnectionLost

        void onConnectionLost()
        Invoked when there are problems with the network connection and the connection to the server has been lost. The application should log in again and re-establish a new session, or direct the user to do so.

      • onConnectionRetry

        void onConnectionRetry(int attemptNumber,
                       long delayUntilNextAttempt)
        Invoked when a connection has been lost and a retry attempt failed.
        Parameters:
        attemptNumber - The number of times that the connection has been retried
        delayUntilNextAttempt - The time until the next retry attempt

      • onConnectionReestablished

        void onConnectionReestablished()
        Invoked when a failed connection has been reestablished.

      • onGenericError

        void onGenericError(java.lang.String error,
                    java.lang.String reason)
        Invoked when a generic error has occurred when processing a request.
        Parameters:
        error -
        reason -
